name: TALL
description:
Tall is an indie platform game made in unity, my first "game" and I started with 0 knowledge about Unity, this is an idea for what it will be about and a little test to see how the controls handle with new players.

By the way I don't know how to make it to exit presing esc, so you have to use alt+f4 if you want to exit!.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    

 Tall full release will be launched in 1 of march, 2019 available in two languages.

-Made with 0.00$ budget, for anyone who wants to test.
